name: Toucan Capital
overview: Toucan Capital Fund II, L.P. is a $140 million venture capital fund focused on seed and early-stage life science and advanced technology investments. Toucan Capital Corp. launched its first fund in 1997 and began investing its current fund in August of 2001. Toucan invests nationwide and is one of the largest and most active venture capital funds in seed and early-stage life science. Toucan has also been an early investor in nanotechnology. Toucan is especially active in the mid-Atlantic region, one of the richest markets in the country for life science and certain advanced technologies, and a market that has generally been underserved by venture capital.

funding_round.source_description: Q THERAPEUTICS ANNOUNCES SERIES B INVESTMENT
